channel.title: Flutter Inner Source
channel.description: Guides and documentation from the Flutter inner source community.

item.title: Prevent a Malicious Contribution
item.dc:creator: Rob Tuley
item.description: How to secure critical branches in your repository to reduce the risk of malicious contribution.

item.title: gRPC
item.dc:creator: Renato Cardoso
item.description: What is gRPC? How does it compare to REST? And when would you use it?

item.title: GitHub ❤️ Slack
item.dc:creator: Nuno Crisóstomo
item.description: Examples of using GitHub and Slack together to notify your stakeholders about changes or deployments.

item.title: Unpopular Work
item.dc:creator: Rob Tuley
item.description: How to manage the assignment of unpopular work in inner source. When several teams could do it, which team should do it?

item.title: GitHub Influencers
item.dc:creator: Tiago Almeida, Arun Dani
item.description: Who in Flutter-Global can be considered the most influential? Who would be best to spread updates and news?

item.title: Quadtrees
item.dc:creator: Damien Raymond
item.description: In this article, we will discuss approaches to implement collision detection and indexes for spatial queries using a simpler example to illustrate.

item.title: Major vs Minor
item.dc:creator: Rob Tuley
item.description: How separate processes for major and minor change reduces noise and speeds up delivery.

item.title: Lazy Consensus
item.dc:creator: Rob Tuley
item.description: Sharing requires consensus. Getting several groups to agree is hard. Lazy consensus is a solution worth knowing.

item.title: Automated Labels
item.dc:creator: Nuno Crisóstomo
item.description: Codebase Governor now supports adding labels to PRs and Issues automatically to help cross-divisional visibility.

item.title: The Pyramid in 8 Minutes
item.dc:creator: Rob Tuley
item.description: A video explanation of what inner source is, and how we use a pyramid as a map to understand the steps needed to do it.

item.title: Inner Source Product Management
item.dc:creator: Rob Tuley
item.description: Phil explains how our inner sourced Global Betting Platform is product managed.

item.title: Why are PRs slow?
item.dc:creator: Tiago Almeida
item.description: What are the key factors that make a PR slow? Check using GitHub data from the last 6 months.

item.title: Deployment Repository
item.dc:creator: Rob Tuley
item.description: Bernard explains the use of a deployment repository to separate shared application code from the infrastructure code for a specific deployment.

item.title: Capability Coordinator
item.dc:creator: Rob Tuley
item.description: Meeting Rita to understand her Capability Co-ordinator role in gbp.

item.title: Big PR, Bad Reviews
item.dc:creator: Tiago Almeida
item.description: Do big pull requests get worse reviews than small ones? Check using data from 80,000 Flutter PRs.

item.title: Branching Models in 7 Minutes
item.dc:creator: Rob Tuley
item.description: A video explanation of 3 common branching models used in Flutter-Global and when you should use them.
